author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Destiny: Rising trailer for the upcoming mobile sci-fi RPG shooter game set in the Destiny universe. The new Destiny: Rising trailer shows action-packed gameplay and more. Destiny: Rising is coming to Apple App Store and Google Play Store on August 28, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Destiny: Rising - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Thunderstruck Muay Thai legend is making his way back to The King of Iron Fist Tournament in Tekken 8. Here's an early look at Fahkumram along with a starter guide to give you a head start when it comes to learning the character once he drops on 7/7 for Character Pass 2 holders, and 7/10 for everyone else.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tekken 8 - Fahkumram Starter Guide and Early Look

author: IGN
description:
This Death Stranding 2 sequence looks almost too good to be real. Captured in 4K 60FPS on PS5 Pro, the scene shows off an insane level of visual fidelity—thousands of particles on screen, beautiful lighting, and smooth gameplay that feels straight out of a dream. Heads-up: this clip includes a moment from the mid-game. Nothing major is explained or spelled out, but if you're sensitive to spoilers, consider this your friendly warning.

#IGN #Gaming
title: This Death Stranding 2 Sequences Feels Too Pretty to Be Real | PS5 Pro 4K 60FPS

author: IGN
description:
Death Relives is a 3D first-person survival horror action exploration game developed by Nyctophile Studios. Players will enter a nightmarish world where survival from long-forgotten gods is the ultimate objective. Explore real historical places from Aztec mythology as players must utilize unique combat and stealth mechanics to fight against the ancient gods of the Aztecs and send their souls to the Mictlan, the underworld of Aztec mythology. Death Relives is coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC on July 25, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Relives - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:

Death Stranding 2: On The Beach is available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#IGN #Gaming #DeathStranding 2
title: Death Stranding 2: On The Beach - Official Accolades Trailer

description:

author: IGN
description:
The next chapter from the World of John Wick follows Eve Macarro (Ana de Armas), who is beginning her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma. Eve seeks revenge for her father’s death, and finds herself crossing paths with John Wick himself (Keanu Reeves).

The film is directed by Len Wiseman, written by Shay Hatten, based on characters by Derek Kolstad, and produced by Basil Iwanyk, Erica Lee, and Chad Stahelski.

Ballerina is now available on premium digital and premium video on demand from Lionsgate.
title: Ballerina - Exclusive John Wick Deleted Scene (2025) Keanu Reeves, Anjelica Huston

author: IGN
description:
Helldivers 2 finally arrives on the Xbox! Coming August 26 on Xbox Series X and S.

A new dawn is upon us. Super Earth is expanding its operations and opening new enlistment centres.
Xbox players, your opportunity to enlist is coming when HELLDIVERS 2 deploys to Xbox Series X|S on August 26. 

Together Helldivers, we’ll even the odds and show the bugs, bots, and squids the true meaning of democracy.

#helldivers2 #ign
title: Helldivers 2 - Official Xbox Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Team vehicles? Sense of humor? Following our recent Borderlands 4 hands-on preview, we asked all of you what questions you still had about Gearbox's upcoming Borderlands sequel. We've pulled the best of those questions and done our best to answer them in this follow-up video featuring IGN previews editor Ryan McCaffrey and Borderlands 4 previewer Travis Northup.

Are you excited to play Borderlands 4? Release date: September 12, and coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and Windows. Borderlands 4 on Nintendo Switch 2 is due at a later date.

00:00 - Intro
00:54 - Is Borderlands 4 a return to form for Gearbox?
02:38 - Will there be optional dungeons?
04:04 - Will a Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel system return?
05:14 - Is that a podracer?
06:12 -  Do guns still have alt-firing?
07:48 - Will it bring in new players?
09:41 - Are there returning characters?
11:25 - Will there be a hub?
13:00 - Did you play on easy?
15:43 - When will the graphics improve?
17:47 - Can you play in third person?
18:19
title: Your Borderlands 4 Questions Answered

author: IGN
description:
You’ve made it to one of the most unforgettable encounters in Death Stranding 2, the Lord of the Tar Lake. If you’re going for the Platinum trophy, this boss fight is mandatory. In this guide, we’ll walk you through how to unlock the mission, how to capture the BT needed to summon the boss, and how to survive one of the game’s most cinematic battles.

00:00 - Intro  
00:25 - How to Activate the Order  
00:36 - How to 5-Star Quickly  
01:03 - Prepping for the Tar Lord Fight  
01:20 - Capture the Bait BT  
02:05 - Using the Bait to Summon the Lord of the Tar Lake  
02:26 - Lord of the Tar Lake Boss Tips  
03:13 - Post Fight

#IGN #Gaming
title: Death Stranding 2: How to Trigger and Beat the Lord of the Tar Lake Fight

author: IGN
description:
Kurosawa in 4K, a two-week series of classics by the great Japanese director Akira Kurosawa (1910-1998), gloriously restored in spectacular 4K, will run at Film Forum in New York City from Friday, July 18 through Thursday, July 31, 2025. The nine-film festival features some of the most influential titles by the legendary director, and in all of world cinema, spanning genres from samurai epic to gritty noir. 

All 4K restorations were undertaken by Toho Co., Ltd. in Japan, with many being shown in the U.S. for the first time, including Throne Of Blood, Stray Dog, High And Low, The Hidden Fortress, Ikiru, Yojimbo, and Sanjuro. 

Kurosawa’s acclaimed Seven Samurai recently celebrated its 70th anniversary with a 4K restoration and release at Film Forum in 2024, after it debuted at the Cannes Film Festival.

#IGN #Movies
title: Kurosawa in 4K - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Akira Kurosawa: A Retrospective

author: IGN
description:
A deadly collection of mercenaries have seized control of OmniTower, and RoboCop returns with new weapons, deadlier enemies, and more one liners in this stand-alone expansion for RoboCop: Rogue City, titled, Unfinished Business. In this overview trailer, you'll get brushed up on OCP's latest coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC, all in time for Summer 2025.

#IGN #RoboCop #RoboCopRogueCity
title: RoboCop: Rogue City - Unfinished Business | Official Game Overview

author: IGN
description:
In this snipper from Podcast Beyond 904, A new live-action feature film based on the Street Fighter series is on track for a release in 2026, and new challengers have appeared in the form of casting announcements. To name a few, Jason Mamoa is Blanka, Roman Reigns is Akuma, David Dastmalchian is M. Bison, and 50 Cent is Balrog. It’s completely all over the place, and considering director Kitao Sakurai’s background is in comedy like The Eric Andre Show and Bad Trip, we’re thinking maybe it’s not going to take itself totally seriously? The more we think about this movie, the more excited we are, so here’s hoping that - if nothing else - it’s not boring.

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet

#IGN #Gaming
title: The 2026 Street Fighter Movie Could Be The Least Worst One Yet - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
In today’s Fix, massive layoffs hit Xbox. Who’s affected? What games are being cancelled? And what does this mean for the future of Xbox?

We’re going to talk about all the Xbox news, including what’s happening to games like Perfect Dark and Everwild, the original IP being developed by the Sea of Thieves devs at Rare. We also have updates around the Candy Crush developer, King, and layoff updates around the Forza Motorsports developer, Turn 10 Studios. Even Call of Duty wasn’t spared, there’s updates from the multiple dev studios that support the varying entries of the military shooter.
title: The Games You’ll Never Play Thanks To Xbox’s Massive Layoffs | IGN The Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Timmy Turner Showcase Trailer for Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, an upcoming action-adventure RPG developed by Petit Fabrok and Fair Play Labs. Players can get the rundown on Timmy Turner's wizard-based abilities with the help of Cosmo and Wanda, enabling the use of elemental abilities, spikey balls, and more. Play as Timmy Turner in Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny, launching in Fall 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Nicktoons & The Dice of Destiny - Official Timmy Turner Showcase Trailer
